title: Canson C400100928 XL Series Pen & Ink White, 9-x-12-Inch
features: Gives the artist clean, crisp lines with no feathering
Perfect for use with felt tip, gel, and ballpoint pens
Ideal for both pigment and dye inks
description: Canson XL Series Pen & Ink is an ultra-smooth, bright white paper that gives the artist clean, crisp lines with no feathering. It is perfect for use with felt tip, gel, and ballpoint pens, and is ideal for both pigment and dye inks. Each pad contains 60 Sheets of 80 lb/118 gsm paper.
